info.name: I already have Edge I just do not like it.
info.description: Hide the Microsoft Ad on all Microsoft pages:  Try Microsoft Edge
info.additionalInfo: Every Microsoft page in the world now asks you at the top of the page if you want to switch to Edge, but I already have Edge installed.  If I wanted to use it, I'd use it.  I'm just so sick of how Microsoft insists upon themselves, as if the only reason I would use the web without Microsoft Edge is that I didn't know it existed.

author.name: I already have edge I just don't like it
